AddProduct.input:
https://iot.tencentcloudapi.com/?Action=AddProduct
&Name=产品名称
&Description=产品描述
&DataTemplate.0.Number.Name=Temperature
&DataTemplate.0.Number.Desc=温度
&DataTemplate.0.Number.Mode=rw
&DataTemplate.0.Number.Range.0=0
&DataTemplate.0.Number.Range.1=50.1
&DataTemplate.1.String.Name=Message
&DataTemplate.1.String.Desc=留言
&DataTemplate.1.String.Mode=rw
&DataTemplate.1.String.Range.0=0
&DataTemplate.1.String.Range.1=1024
&DataTemplate.2.Enum.Name=Weather
&DataTemplate.2.Enum.Desc=天气
&DataTemplate.2.Enum.Mode=r
&DataTemplate.2.Enum.Range.0=Sunny
&DataTemplate.2.Enum.Range.1=Rainy
&DataTemplate.3.Bool.Name=Lock
&DataTemplate.3.Bool.Desc=锁
&DataTemplate.3.Bool.Mode=rw
&DataTemplate.3.Bool.Range.0=true
&DataTemplate.3.Bool.Range.1=false
&<公共请求参数>
AddProduct.title: 新增产品

AddRule.input:
https://iot.tencentcloudapi.com/?Action=AddRule
&Name=规则名称
&Description=规则描述
&Query.Field=*
&Query.Topic=iot-4e0wsxpi/+/new-topic-1
&Query.Condition=
&Actions.0.Topic.Topic=iot-gl9kmqrs/new-device-1/new-topic-1
&Actions.1.Service.Url=http://abc.com
&<公共请求参数>
AddRule.title: 新增规则
